parameters.name: gatewayId
parameters.description: The ID of the Cloud-native API Gateway instance.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: The page number to return. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: 1 to 100. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: sourceType
parameters.description:
The service source. Valid values:

*   MSE_NACOS: a service in an MSE Nacos instance
*   K8S: a service in a Kubernetes (K8s) cluster in Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK)
*   FC3: a service in Function Compute
*   VIP: a fixed address
*   DNS: a domain name

Enumerated values:

*   K8S
*   FC3
*   DNS
*   VIP
*   MSE_NACOS
